about:
First and foremost, I love writing code. Ever since
        writing my first program in Python and manipulating it
        to produce a desired output, I have been obsessed with
        the idea of using software to solve practical problems.
        Software engineering is a never-ending puzzle that I am
        passionately engaged in solving, and I believe in the
        power of programming to transform and improve the
        
        lives of people around the world.
I am currently An Aspiring FullStack Developer @Life Choices and also I'm a Freelancer.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript.

skills.title: API
skills.experience: In case we want to secure, identify, and authorize access to a user on a specific resource, we need to have an API, which is a glue between the front end and back end. We can set up a lot of features or logic, such as middleware, database configuration, JSON web tokens, and many more. For the past 7 years, I have been working on APIs using Django and ExpressJS.

skills.experience: None for now. I'm teaching my self and book to write @Pearson Institute
